title: How far can an NFC reader detect? - Quora

response.answer_text: Its read-distance is extremely low (in the range of a few centimeters only). Know more about NFC here (in short)
Range of NFC is 4mts to 10cms. However, this is heavily dependant on antenna tuning and power. having said that, designer need to fine tune it to support the theoretical max. range in field :)
